---
title: "Form MSME-1 - Automated Filing with MCA"
weight: 402
layout: docs
description: "Are you looking to bulk upload data to Form MSME-1 of MCA from excel?"
---

### Are you looking to bulk upload data to Form MSME-1 of MCA from excel?

If yes, then you are at right place. We will go step-by-step on how to do that.&#x20;

Many **Company Secretarial Softwares** has features of uploading excel sheet and quickly download Form MSME-1 with all data filled up.

However, for **those who do not have such software** and need to bulk fill up data in Form MSME-1 and save time, please go through all steps below.

### Step 1 - Start with [TextBlaze](https://blaze.today/?ref=URAZ7TZN)

[TextBlaze](https://blaze.today/?ref=URAZ7TZN) is a text-expanding software which saves our lot of time in our work. As a first step, create an account in [Textblaze](https://blaze.today/?ref=URAZ7TZN) by clicking on this [link](https://blaze.today/?ref=URAZ7TZN).

Once this link opens up in Chrome, click on button "**Add Text Blaze to Chrome**" as shown in below link.

### Step 2 - Add Chrome extension

On the next screen after clicking on button, click on "**Add to Chrome**" button on next screen.

### Step 3 - Create account in TextBlaze

Once extension is added, it will ask you to create account in TextBlaze.

{{< alert text="If you already have an account in TextBlaze, you can directly login." />}}

### Step 4 - Install Windows App of TextBlaze

Click on [**this link**](https://blaze.today/windows/) and install Windows App of TextBlaze by clicking on "**Get it from Microsoft**".

### Step 5 - Login to Windows App

Login to Windows App of TextBlaze with your same login details (as per [Step 3](#step-3-create-account-in-textblaze))

### Step 6 - Insert Snippet for Form MSME-1

Click on [**this link**](https://dashboard.blaze.today/new#?name=MSME%20Form&shortcut=%2Fmsme&quickentry=false&%3D%3D) to insert Snippet.

On next screen (below), Click on **Save** to save the snippet in your textblaze account.

### Step 7 - Keep the data ready in Excel

Once Windows App of TextBlaze is installed, you need to prepare the data to be filled up in Form MSME-1. You can use following excel format to fill up the data.

### Step 8 - Copy the data from excel

If your data is less than 99 rows, then select entire dataset and type "**Ctrl+C**". (i.e. copy data).  If data is more, then you can fill up 99 entries per form. In that case, select only 99 entries first and copy.

You can refer [this video link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?lc=UgzJXGHup1NQdGGtiO94AaABAg&v=Ny03Lc-AbqU) how I have done it.

### Step 9 - execute the snippet in the form.

Once the Form MSME-1 is opened, mention number of entries you have selected (as shown in video).

In the table, in the first field from left side, type "/msme" and wait for few seconds. The entries will be automatically filled up.

{{< alert text="There is possibility that few boxes may not be filled up, but that is fine. You can always fill it up manually." />}}

{{< alert context="danger" text="If you see that the snippet is behaving or not stopping, you can simply click **Esc** to stop the run." />}}

I hope this will be helpful to fill up the Form MSME-1 quickly.&#x20;

If you have questions, please feel free to drop your query on [my email](cs.pratik@gmail.com).
